title: My Brain
description: Does your body have a boss? Yes, it does: the brain! Readers will love learning all about how the brain works as the boss of the body systems. My Brain gives students a clear description of how the brain works, and clever illustrations provide information as well as entertainment. This captivating book is also great for teaching author's purpose and using a glossary.
